statements: SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection
SELECT id, current_demand FROM anomaly_detection WHERE historical_data > 100
SELECT id FROM anomaly_detection ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT current_demand FROM anomaly_detection WHERE current_demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE current_demand > 75 AND historical_data < 50
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE current_demand > 100 ORDER BY historical_data DESC
SELECT id, current_demand FROM anomaly_detection WHERE current_demand < 50
SELECT MAX(current_demand), MIN(historical_data) FROM anomaly_detection
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 6 AND historical_data >= 200
SELECT AVG(current_demand) AS avg_demand FROM anomaly_detection
SELECT * FROM current_demand
SELECT id, product_name FROM current_demand WHERE demand > 100
SELECT product_name, demand FROM historical_data ORDER BY demand DESC
SELECT id, product_name, timestamp FROM historical_data WHERE product_name = 'Product A'
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM current_demand WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, SUM(demand) FROM historical_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING SUM(demand) > 5000 ORDER BY SUM(demand) ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, demand FROM current_demand WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT product_name, AVG(demand) AS average_demand FROM current_demand GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(demand) > 50 ORDER BY average_demand DESC;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(id) AS total_products FROM historical_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM current_demand WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT demand_date, demand_value FROM historical_demand WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT MAX(demand_value) AS max_demand_value FROM current_demand;
SELECT * FROM historical_demand ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT region_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'outlier';
SELECT * FROM current_demand WHERE region_id = 1 AND demand_date = '2022-10-10';
SELECT region_id, SUM(demand_value) AS total_demand FROM historical_demand GROUP BY region_id HAVING total_demand > 1000;
SELECT region_id, AVG(demand_value) AS average_demand FROM current_demand WHERE demand_value > 500 GROUP BY region_id ORDER BY average_demand DESC;
SELECT region_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type IN ('Outlier', 'Error') ORDER BY region_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT region_id FROM historical_demand WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT * FROM current_demand;
SELECT demand_id, demand_value FROM current_demand ORDER BY demand_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(demand_value) AS avg_demand_value FROM current_demand;
SELECT MAX(demand_value) AS max_demand_value FROM current_demand WHERE demand_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE historical_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM current_demand ORDER BY demand_id DESC;
SELECT historical_value, historical_date FROM historical_data WHERE historical_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY historical_value ASC;
SELECT anomaly_status, anomaly_date FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY anomaly_date DESC;
SELECT result_value, detection_id FROM anomaly_results WHERE result_value > 0.5 ORDER BY result_id ASC;
SELECT demand_value AS demand, demand_id AS id FROM current_demand WHERE demand_value < 100 ORDER BY demand_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, demand FROM current_demand WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT product_name, date FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_demand, historical_demand FROM anomaly_detection_results WHERE is_anomaly=TRUE;
SELECT * FROM current_demand WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, demand FROM historical_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY demand ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, date FROM anomaly_detection_results WHERE historical_demand < 50 AND is_anomaly = true;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products INNER JOIN categories ON products.category = categories.category_name ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY category_name;
